name: Lithic Guide
achievementgroup: Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts

stage1.title: Lithic Guide
stage1.description: Follow 20 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm is counted separately).

stage3.title: Lithic Guide
stage3.description: Follow 60 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm is counted separately).
